en.tapWords: Tap the words in the correct order
en.verificationFailed: Verification failed. Please, tap the words again in the correct order. Press Reset to tap the words again or press back to review your mnemonic.
en.verificationSuccessful: Mnemonic verification successful! Please, introduce a password and tap on finish. This will allow you to visualize your mnemonic afterwards.
en.passwordVerificationFailed: Password verification failed. Please, introduce a password that has at least 8 characters or numbers.
